on NBC, Colin Powell said that part of the reason he is supporting Barack Obama is because he did not like the negative tone of John McCain 's campaign, which has noted the links between Barack Obama and domestic terrorist Bill Ayers . It troubled me. We have two wars. We have economic problems, we have health problems.... Those are the problems the American people want to hear about, not about Mr. Bill Ayers , not about who's a Muslim and not a Muslim. Those kind of images going out on Al Jazeera are killing us around the world, he said. "I thought it was over the top. It was beyond just good political fighting back and forth.... We can't judge our people and we can't hold our elections on that kind

one of the reasons I've been able to make it through the season." Another reason he's here is the fans. Michael Vick was the leading NFC vote-getter for the Pro Bowl. I'm very thankful and happy to be here and I'm going to try and put on a great show for the fans, he said. "This one feels great due to the fact that I've been through so much. To be able to get back to this position is paramount to me and I'm just thankful."

Should a Nokia-Microsoft alliance develop over Windows Phone 7, it could prove beneficial to both parties. You get access to their WP7 intellectual property Scot-free and access to the U.S. market where your share has dived to the low single-digit level, and in doing[ so] cut your bloated handset business R&D budget, Berenberg Bank analyst Adnaan Ahmad wrote in a Jan. 31 letter addressed to both CEOs. You always have to feel http://wn.com/Allen_Iverson_26pts_Melo_38pts_vs_Sonics_KDurant_37pts_07/08_NBA Touted rookies Kevin Durant and Jeff Kollman Green both had career-best efforts for the Seattle SuperSonics and damaged the Denver Nuggets' postseason aspirations. Kevin Durant , the second- overall pick in last year's draft and the leading candidate for rookie of the year, scored a season-high 37 points and Green, the fifth pick, had a season-high 35 to lead the Sonics to a 151-147 double-overtime victory over Denver on Sunday night. "My teammates were making plays and I was just there finishing them, Green said. The loss kept the Nuggets( 46-31) in a tie with Golden State for the eighth and final playoff spot in the Western Conference. The Warriors lost to New Orleans, 108-96, earlier Sunday

begins its story with Donald Rumsfeld 's account about being told by President Bush , two weeks after the 9/11 attacks, to prepare review the Pentagon's plans for a war with Iraq. According to the Times: Two weeks after the worst terrorist attack in our nation's history, those of us in the Department of Defense were fully occupied, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld recalls. But the president insisted on new military plans for Iraq, Mr. Donald Rumsfeld writes. "He wanted the options to be` creative."
